code: import{useEffect,useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{useGetUserID}from"../hooks/useGetUserID";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const SavedMemories=()=>{const[savedMemories,setSavedMemories]=useState([]);const userID=useGetUserID();useEffect(()=>{const fetchSavedMemories=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get("http://localhost:3001/memories/savedMemories/".concat(userID));setSavedMemories(response.data.savedMemories);}catch(err){console.error(err);}};fetchSavedMemories();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Saved Memories"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:savedMemories.map(memory=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:memory.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"descriptions",children:memory.descriptions.map((desc,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:desc},i))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:memory.imageURL,alt:memory.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Time Spent: ",memory.timeSpent]})]},memory._id))})]});};
